meanings.definition: A group of chemical compounds derived from salicylic acid, commonly used as pain relievers and anti-inflammatory drugs.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed acetylsalicylates to help with my headache.
meanings.sent2: Acetylsalicylates are often found in over-the-counter medications.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the acetylsalicylates for candy and had a bitter surprise.
meanings.sent4: The acetylsalicylates acted like tiny warriors fighting the pain in my body.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of acetylsalicylates gleamed like a beacon of relief on the shelf.
